course_description: Pricing is a critical business activity and one that is often viewed as a significant challenge. In this course we will take a hands on approach to developing pricing tactics and strategies. Using data whenever possible we will explore techniques for setting prices in a variety of contexts.
prerequisites: MKT 340 or SPECSTUBUS students or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 1102, Section #: 1101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: S. Vastani, Status: Open
